hero.overTitle: Learn Languages by Reading Real Novels
hero.heading: Enjoying eBooks? Use it to learn languages
hero.description: Our smart reader app for kindle and kobo makes reading ebooks a life changing habit. Learn a language by reading whatever you like!

section1.title: Why not taking advantage of the time you already use to read?
section1.description: Thanks to the language mixing technology, you will get organic and casual learning while you keep your usual reading flow and fun.

bulletPoint.adjustable: Keep your usual reading flow and fun

bulletPoint.wordByWord: Get more done, using the same time

section2.title: Works on kindle, kobo and smartphones
section2.description: Experience LangoMango on your favorite Kindle or Kobo! Enjoy the exceptional battery life, paper-like display, and distraction-free environment that makes e-readers perfect for immersive reading. Simply access through your devices browser and dive into your books with all language learning features at your fingertips. Whether you are lounging at home or reading under the sun, your trusted e-reader now becomes your language learning companion.

section3.title: Play the numbers game
section3.description: Studies estimate that the comprehensible input required to achieve fluency is 2,000,000 words. With an average novel containing 100,000 words and LangoMangos ability to gradually increase the percentage of the target language, you will be able to accumulate significant exposure while enjoying great stories. Follow a natural progression as you improve from A1-15% - A2-30% - B1-60% - B2-90% - C1-100% of target language content as you advance.

section4.title: Cost effective
section4.description: LangoMango combines content in your native language and the target language in a ratio you can handle, creating the perfect learning environment. Built-in sentence translation and word-by-word assistance make the target language easy to read, eliminating the need for expensive textbooks or courses.

section5.title: This could be your success story
section5.overTitle: What will be like after 1 year?
section5.description:
As every night, I took my Kindle to enjoy reading for an hour, when I realized that I was reading Game of Thrones almost entirely in Swedish. I had become so accustomed to reading like this that it had become the new normal for me.

How amazing is it that through my main hobby, I was able to understand a new language? Even more remarkable, after several attempts with other apps and private tutors, I was sure I wasn't able to stick to learning. This time however, it was not boring, it has become a enjoyable habit for me. What a wonderfull feeling.

languages.title: What languages are supported?
languages.content: Currently, LangoMango supports learning Spanish, English, French, German, Italian, and Portuguese, with more languages coming soon.

questions.question: How does LangoMango work?
questions.answer: LangoMango uses smart algorithms to mix your native language with the language you're learning in a ratio that matches your proficiency level. You can adjust this ratio as you improve.

questions.question: What devices can I use LangoMango on?
questions.answer: LangoMango works on Kindle, Kobo, smartphones, tablets, and computers - any device with a web browser.
